structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Power to conduct studies, apply for subpoenas.
law.text: A transit authority may conduct such surveys and studies, gather such information, and institute such programs and plans as may be reasonably necessary to carry out the purposes of this chapter. If necessary, it may make application for subpoenas, or subpoenas duces tecum to any Circuit Court having proper venue for the production of any records, books or other documents of any privately owned mass transit system operating in whole, or substantially in part, within its transit area when required in the bona fide pursuit of its purposes as specified in this chapter.
